body_html:
@smistad I agree with @m3bm3b on this one.
Upgrade of dependencies can be confusing for people, and weith each upgrade we force that on thousands of people. Would you like to prepare a workaround that can do more if newer version of cmake is available, but still work if user has an older version of cmake?

body:
@smistad I agree with @m3bm3b on this one.
Upgrade of dependencies can be confusing for people, and weith each upgrade we force that on thousands of people. Would you like to prepare a workaround that can do more if newer version of cmake is available, but still work if user has an older version of cmake?
